title: How to Make Candy Nuts

steps.headline: Put a piece of baking paper onto your bench or in a tray.
Slowly heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and very carefully and slowly melt the butter and add the sugar and nuts.
Stir constantly as it cooks or until it turns a golden brown colour.
Remove your saucepan from the heat and add the vanilla.
Tip the nuts quickly onto the baking paper and spread them out evenly.
Allow them to cool before eating.
Refrigerate or freeze for as long as required.

text: Put a piece of baking paper onto your bench or in a tray.  Slowly heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and very carefully and slowly melt the butter and add the sugar and nuts.  Stir constantly as it cooks or until it turns a golden brown colour.  Remove your saucepan from the heat and add the vanilla. Stir it in. Tip the nuts quickly onto the baking paper and spread them out evenly.  Allow them to cool before eating.  Refrigerate or freeze for as long as required.  Finished.
